name: the-swan-station
description: Dharma Initiative Swan Station - Real-time multiplayer timer game

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:copy && npm run build:optimize && npm run build:verify
scripts.build:copy: cp -r src dist/ && cp -r assets dist/ && cp index.html dist/ && cp test-css.html dist/
scripts.build:optimize: npm run optimize:audio && npm run optimize:images
scripts.build:verify: echo 'Build completed - checking files:' && ls -la dist/ && ls -la dist/src/
scripts.cleanup: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist && rm yarn.lock && echo 'Cleanup completed'

author: Dharma Initiative
